com.qwertovsky.mailer

Class MessageContent

  • Object
    • MessageContent

  • public class MessageContent
extends Object
    Message with content, content type, charset , contentTransferEncoding, subject and address 'From:'

    For example:

     //simple text message
 MessageContent message = new MessageContent(
        "Message text", "text/plain", "Subject", "utf-8");
 message.setAddressFrom("Company", "sender@company.com", "utf-8");
     //html message with alternative part
 MessageContent message = new MessageContent(
        "HTML message", "text/html", "Subject", "utf-8");
 message.setAlternativeText("Text message", "utf-8");
 message.setAddressFrom("Company", "sender@company.com", "utf-8");
    Author:
    Qwertovsky

      • MessageContent

        public MessageContent(File EMLFile)
               throws QwertoMailerException,
                      FileNotFoundException,
                      NullPointerException,
                      Exception
        Create message from EML file.
        Only content, content type and subject will be get from file.
        Not allow create message with no subject or with empty subject.
        Parameters:
        EMLFile - file contains message in EML file format
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - EML file not exists
        Exception
        NullPointerException - EML file is null
        QwertoMailerException - Subject can't be null or empty

      • MessageContent

        public MessageContent(InputStream EMLFileIStream)
               throws QwertoMailerException,
                      Exception
        Create message from input stream of EML file.
        Only content, content type and subject will be get from file.
        Not allow create message with no subject or with empty subject.
        Parameters:
        EMLFileIStream - input stream contains message in EML file format
        Throws:
        Exception
        QwertoMailerException - Subject can't be null or empty

      • MessageContent

        public MessageContent(String content,
              String contentType,
              String subject,
              String charset)
               throws QwertoMailerException
        Create message from text.
        Not allow create message with no subject or with empty subject
        Parameters:
        content - text
        contentType - Mime type of content ('text/plain' or 'text/html')
        subject -
        charset - encoding of content (default is "utf-8")
        Throws:
        QwertoMailerException - if content is null or content is empty text line
        - if content type is null or content type is empty text line or error parse, message "Bad ContentType"
        - if subject is null or subject is empty text line, message "Bad subject"

      • addInlineAttachment

        protected String addInlineAttachment(String path)
                              throws Exception,
                                     IOException,
                                     QwertoMailerException
        Add inline attachment to message
        Change html content to multipart/related.
        Replace path in 'src'-attribute to "cid:content-id"
        Return <content-id>
        Parameters:
        path - file path from image attribute 'src' (<img src="path" />)
        Returns:
        Content-ID of attachment with < >
        Throws:
        Exception
        IOException
        QwertoMailerException - Inline image url is null or empty

      • setRelated

        public List<String> setRelated()
                        throws Exception,
                               IOException,
                               QwertoMailerException
        Change html part of message to multipart/related part.
        Files must be available by path, that is specified in attribute SRC in tag IMG.
        Returns:
        list of file path, that was specified in html part
        Throws:
        Exception
        IOException
        QwertoMailerException

        charset - encoding

        Exception

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(String[] headers,
                 String[] parameters)
                   throws Exception,
                          QwertoMailerException
        Put inline parameters in message
        If header specified (ex. $header), but relevant parameter is null - $header will be replaced to empty string
        Parameters:
        headers - array of parameter's headers
        parameters - array of parameters
        Throws:
        IOException
        QwertoMailerException - Headers can't be null or have length equal to 0,
        Parameters can't be null or have length equal to 0
        Parameters must be not less then headers
        Exception

      • setParameters

        public void setParameters(Map<String,String> parameters)
                   throws Exception,
                          QwertoMailerException
        Put inline parameters in message
        If header specified (ex. $header), but relevant parameter is null - $header will be replaced to empty string
        Parameters:
        parameters - map of parameters
        Throws:
        IOException
        QwertoMailerException - Parameters can't be null or have length equal to 0
        Exception
